{"id":514163611,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1624838653,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/514163611/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Sudoku","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isValid(vector<vector<char>>& board ,int r ,int c,char num){\n        int n = board.size();\n        int m = board[0].size();\n        \n        for(int i =0;i<m;i++){\n            if(i == c) continue;\n            if(board[r][i] == num ){\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        for(int i =0;i<n;i++){\n            if(i == r) continue;\n            if(board[i][c] == num){\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        int start_row = r - r %3 ;\n        int start_column = c - c%3;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<3;i++){\n            for(int j =0;j<3;j++){\n                if(i+start_row == r && j+start_column == c){\n                    continue;\n                }\n                if(board[start_row+i][start_column+j] == num){\n                    return false;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return true ;\n        \n    }\n    bool isValidSudoku(vector<vector<char>>& board) {\n        bool ans =false;\n        for(int i=0;i<board.size();i++){\n            for(int j =0;j<board[0].size();j++){\n                if(board[i][j]!='.'){\n                    char num = board[i][j];\n                    ans =  isValid(board,i,j,num);\n                    if(ans ==true)\n                        return ans;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-sudoku"}
